column4: IS their any possible way to install ubuntu on a system with a 64MB ram?
on the system is currently Windows 98 i have the ubuntu 6.06 LTS disk
the cdrom does not accept cdrw
Im their and i dont see the download
what os are you on now?
i'd mail you xubuntu cd, but i dont know
want a cd in return or 3
i'll do it for you within the next week
dont send me a cd, i dont need them
gramma just bought me a hundred pack of cdrs
yeah and now i got them stacked in my closet
